entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (nova_orion_intro_on_station.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_13: You did what? Fine here it is, please hurry.
entries.s_16: Well do hurry, we need to find out what happened to that freighter.
entries.s_18: Welcome to Nova Orion Industries. You wouldn't be willing to help us with a problem would you?
entries.s_22: One of our freighters has not arrived and we need someone to find out what happened. And, if necessary, escort it to safety.
entries.s_26: Great! You will be compensated. Here is the freighters flight path. Follow it from the end backward till you find out what happened.
entries.s_28: Do you know any Master pilots that can help me?
entries.s_4: Thanks again for your help %TU, have you found Willard yet?
entries.s_6: Welcome back %TU. I heard all about your exploits out there. You should talk to my colleague, Willard Wassleman III. He can get you a position within the company. We can really use a pilot like you.
entries.s_8: What are you doing here Pilot? You need to get out there and help.
